alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 9:12AM MST until December 26 at 1:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST /1 PM MST/ TODAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph. * WHERE...In Nevada, Las Vegas Valley and Northeast Clark County. In California, Eastern Mojave Desert and Western Mojave Desert. In Arizona, Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...Until noon PST /1 PM MST/ today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
